He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome. "I'll never forget this day," an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play. failure of Microsoft's hostile takeover bid for Yahoo has caused the Wall Street Journal to publish a report calling for a sell-off of the company's stock. In a hard-hitting opinion piece, Brett Arends writes: Now is an excellent opportunity to sell any Microsoft stock you have left.
